title: Women representation in the literature department
summary: This chart shows the percentage of Women represented in literature department in Women .
\\n From the chart , we can see that Engineering is the Department with the highest representation of Women , with 70 percentage of the Department being Women .
Computer_Science follows with 60 percentage of the Department being Women , although this is a big drop from Engineering .
gold: The following graph show the percentage representation of women in the literature department . Engineering has the most representation at 70 % . Literature has the lowest percent representation at 22 % .
